body: for single gesv on cuda, you should use `magma_sgesv_gpu` or `magma_dgesv_gpu`. see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensorMathMagma.cu#L63-L99
body_html: for single gesv on cuda, you should use magma_sgesv_gpu or magma_dgesv_gpu. see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensorMathMagma.cu#L63-L99
body_text: for single gesv on cuda, you should use magma_sgesv_gpu or magma_dgesv_gpu. see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensorMathMagma.cu#L63-L99
